York to remain affiliated with the NUS

By Joseph Silke

York students decide to remain part of the organisation with 60.1 per cent voting to stay affiliated. The decision means YUSU is expected to stay in the NUS until at least 2022 on turnout of 1017 votes, passing quorum by 43 votes.

By Joseph Silke

By Joseph Silke

Law students are outraged after mistakes by University staff at today's exam on EU law left many students without correct exam papers. There have also been claims that students with the correct papers were given an unfair advantage.
